ComicInfo.Title: The Brimstone Land Of Christian Reckoning
ComicInfo.Summary: The horror continues - twice a month with the unprecedented launch of Garth Ennis' Crossed: Badlands. With the modern masters of horror at the helm, Ennis and artist Jacen Burrows, this promises to be a new epic tale of loss and carnage!Our band of survivors starts to unravel as they realize that the Scottish highlands are no longer safe and the Crossed grow ever closer.With nothing but a few rifles and their wits to put against the hordes of depraved Crossed, they soon find that in the world of Crossed there is no hope.
